column4: It seems like I have to learn the Linux language before I can do anything in Ubuntu.
I want to upgrade to 5.04 Hoary or something..,
follow the instructions there. It will talk you through it all.
did you follow the instructions on the link I gave you?
you can scroll up you know :)
what don't you get? Did you follow the instructions?
the ones I have given you twice. :)
ok... so what's the problem? Those are the instructions for upgrading...
you're having a problem, and we're here to help :). We can't really help if we don't know the problem though ;-)
they are about how you upgrade to hoary, like you wanted.
